thread.section_title: TShirt Studio Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of tshirtstudio.com
thread.title: Andrew James Avery
thread.title_full: TShirt Studio reviewed by Andrew James Avery

author: Andrew James Avery
title: Andrew James Avery
text:
Ordered an apron for my wife for her birthday 19th mar .. but have opened and looked at the quality and colour and the printed photo I uploaded ..
Very pleased with the quality and the sharpness of the photo print onto the apron
The material is of good quality and the apron seems to be very well made and the design is simple classic but effective .
Delivery was as described and packaging adequate ..
Hence 5 stars ..
Would definitely recommend using this company ..
